messages.subject: ADD Link and disorganization
messages.msgSnippet: Ang, Thanks for the link on adult ADD types. I m trying to hurry to check all my messages while Will s napping, but will check it out later. It s funny you
messages.messageBody:
Ang,

Thanks for the link on adult ADD types. I'm trying to
hurry to check all my messages while Will's napping,
but will check it out later.

It's funny you mentioned flylady, because I tried it,
but I'm wayyy to disorganized to even establish her
routines. Heck, I can't even get myself to put shoes
on most mornings :)

So I've resigned myself to my fits-and-starts approach
to housecleaning and deluding myself into believing
that once the children have left the nest, I'll have
the time to tend to housework.

Here's to dust and clutter and happy children :)

Shelly

=====
"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever does." -- Margaret Mead
